name: Alien Escape (itch) (ROHANcreation, Prasad)
description:
This is Super Cool Puzzle Game where you have to take both the aliens through the portal and the portal will only open when you collect all the gems.

but there is a twist green alien has the vision and the red is blind, so only the red alien can collect the keys and the green alien can navigate him.

Creators:

Aniket Darandale 

Prasad Chandole

Rohan Wankhede
